name: BAMZOOKi
description:
NOTE: This is an installer for BAMZOOKi version 3.1! THIS IS NOT FOR BAMZOOKi Street Rules!
Requires having BAMZOOKi executable file bamzooki_v3_1_fullbundle_build115_158_setupsigned.exe already downloaded locally.
content:
files:
- installer: 'N/A:Select the Setup executable:'
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/BAMZOOKi/bamzooki_v3_1_fullbundle_build115_158_setupsigned.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
